mapper.select: SELECT I.DEBATE_ID,T.MEETING_TYPE,P.DEBATE_TYPE, I.TITLE,I.OUTLINE,B.DESCRIPTION,B.AUTHOR,B.TITLE AS BOOK_TITLE, TO_CHAR(I.DEBATE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS DEBATE_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(I.DEBATE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS DEBATE_END_DATE, DB.DEBATE_BOOK_ID,DB.ISBN13,B.COVER FROM TBL_DEBATE I JOIN TBL_MEETING_TYPE T ON I.MEETING_ID = T.MEETING_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_TYPE P ON I.DEBATE_TYPE_ID = P.DEBATE_TYPE_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_BOOK DB ON I.DEBATE_ID = DB.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON DB.ISBN13 = B.ISBN13 WHERE MEETING_TYPE='온라인' AND TO_CHAR(DEBATE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY DEBATE_ID DESC

SELECT I.DEBATE_ID,T.MEETING_TYPE,P.DEBATE_TYPE, I.TITLE,I.OUTLINE,B.DESCRIPTION,B.AUTHOR,B.TITLE AS BOOK_TITLE, TO_CHAR(I.DEBATE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS DEBATE_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(I.DEBATE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS DEBATE_END_DATE, DB.DEBATE_BOOK_ID,DB.ISBN13,B.COVER FROM TBL_DEBATE I JOIN TBL_MEETING_TYPE T ON I.MEETING_ID = T.MEETING_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_TYPE P ON I.DEBATE_TYPE_ID = P.DEBATE_TYPE_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_BOOK DB ON I.DEBATE_ID = DB.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON DB.ISBN13 = B.ISBN13 WHERE MEETING_TYPE='오프라인' AND TO_CHAR(DEBATE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY DEBATE_ID DESC

SELECT P.POST_ID,P.ISBN13,M.NICKNAME,P.POST_TITLE,M.MEMBER_ID,P.POST_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS CREATE_DATE, TP.PROFILE_ID,TP.PROFILE_UUID,TP.PROFILE_UPLOAD,TP.PROFILE_NAME,B.COVER FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_PROFILE TP ON M.MEMBER_ID = TP.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON P.ISBN13 = B.ISBN13 ORDER BY POST_ID DESC
